channel.title: WARROCK [Oldschool Reworked] [24/7 ONLINE]
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://warrockps.com/forum/public/style_images/brave/logo.png[/img]
Warrock is a massive professional private server that brings a whole new environment to gaming. It comes with diverse quests and gameplay unique to the server, a plethora of cities to visit, and countless activities to be enjoyed. We strive for perfection in economic balance as PvMers and Pkers alike. This isn't to be considered the average private server where you will get bored within a weeks time. Our dedicated developers will be constantly adding new content for your enjoyment.
We plan to expand the server beyond just teleports and commonly used points of interest and will provide detailed content for you to spend hours enjoying; as the whole land of Runescape is planned to be used.
FEATURES: - Perfect clipping for npc, players and projectiles. - Perfected combat system for all styles (magic, range and melee). - All rs shops and npc's (8000+ npc's) - 10+ quests - All skills working, including hunting and farming with real timers! - Never seen before economy - Player based grand exchange - Active development - Minigames 100% working (duel arena, pest control, tzhaar fight caves, tzhaar fight pits, ..- - 100 Godwars (npc vs npc, killcount, boss damages, animation tweaks, ..) - Based on Apollo
[url=http://warrockps.com/forum]Click here for our forums.[/url] [/CENTER]

item.title: WARROCK [Oldschool Reworked] [24/7 ONLINE]
item.dc:creator: @Xerial Xerial
item.description:
@Xerial wrote:

  • Talk with Mosol Rei near shilo village entrance to get into the city.
  • Donator status added, features will be added later.
  • the slayer gem will offer a teleport to your slayer task when talking to it.
    this is still a work in progress, it will give you an announcement if the teleport isn’t added yet, please report these.
  • Mandrith added in Edgeville, this npc will offer teleports to locations in the wildy:Mage bank, bounty hunter, Rogues castle and graveyard.
  • Starter changed to make it a little nicer for new players, also new players will start at the grand exchange.
  • Home teleport will bring you to grand exchange.
  • You can now recharge your glory at the fountain of heroes. - Thanks to Nick.
  • Slayer token shop added at the g.e, this npc can turn your slayer points into tokens and will offer various rewards for tokens.
  • You can now use the swamp boat shortcut to barrows.

We already have a huge content base from the source, please keep on posting bugs and suggestions so we can improve Warrock even more!

Read full topic
